definition: and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs

sentences.english: Oh dear, I'd been looking forward to warmer weather here.
sentences.chinese: 噢天啊，我原期望這兒會有較暖和的天氣。

sentences.english: The old woman a maid servant to clean her house.
sentences.chinese: 老婦人僱傭了一個暖和的僕人去洗她的馬。

sentences.english: Lying on the drafty floor of the airplane, there was no way to warm myself.
sentences.chinese: 躺在透風的飛機地板上，根本無法讓身體暖和起來。

sentences.english: The girl  thawed her frozen hands in front of the fire.
sentences.chinese: 女孩在火邊讓凍僵的手暖和起來。

sentences.english: He breathed on his hands to warm them up.
sentences.chinese: 他衝着手哈氣，好暖和些。

sentences.english: The weatherman forecasts snow for tomorrow, so bring a warm jacket.
sentences.chinese: 天氣預報員預報明天有雪，所以帶件暖和的外套吧。

sentences.english: If taken into a warm room , ice will gradually disappear and change into water.
sentences.chinese: 如果冰被拿進暖和的房間，就會慢慢地變成水。

sentences.english: We have wran days and cool nights in early spring and late autumn.
sentences.chinese: 新奧爾良的初春和晚秋白天暖和，夜間涼爽。

sentences.english: Hiemal moment relies on sunshine to be able to become very warm and downy.
sentences.chinese: 冬季的時候靠陽光就可以變得非常暖和而柔和。

sentences.english: Alcohol dehydrates the body and makes you feel warmer than you actually are.
sentences.chinese: 酒精讓你的身體缺水，讓你覺得身體更暖和些。

sentences.english: This is a warm blanket, not like that thin one.
sentences.chinese: 這條毯子暖和，不像那條薄的。

sentences.english: Tomorrow will be warm and sunny .
sentences.chinese: 明天即暖和又陽光充足。

sentences.english: It's pretty cold in San Francisco, warm here.
sentences.chinese: 舊金山挺冷，但是這裏很暖和。

sentences.english: Whatever method of heating was used, artificial respiration was essential for reanimation.
sentences.chinese: 無論用任何暖和方法，人工呼吸仍是救生所必需的。

sentences.english: The horses are flinging up their heels in the warm spring air.
sentences.chinese: 馬兒在暖和的春天氣息裏四蹄翻飛。

definition: to stay warm/to protect against the cold
Nuannuan district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan
to defend against the cold/to keep warm
